previewArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City vs. Columbus Crew | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Sporting Kansas City 2, Columbus Crew 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Sporting Kansas City vs. Columbus Crew

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt blocked. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Chance Myers with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Poor defending in the box from #Crew96. That ball from Zusi wasn't incredible. But it squirted through everyone.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: That's what happens when we doubt a player before opening kick. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Unfortunately, maintaining possession out of the back continues to be a struggle for #Crew96.

timelineItems.name: Chris LaMacchia
timelineItems.text: I've said it before and I'll say it again: It looks like Tony Tchani just doesn't care. Just can be bothered. #Lackadaisical #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Rik
timelineItems.text: Anyone who questions Besler's value to the #USMNT back line needs to watch that long switch to Zusi repeatedly. #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 15’: Well, it was always going to be back-and-forth game between these sides. Gotta love the early catalyst. #Crew96 needing an equalizer.

timelineItems.comment: Giancarlo Gonzalez (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: J.
timelineItems.text: Vermes could do so much more with #tfc than Nelsen is doing i believe. At home #skc play like a team that has a plan and believes in it.

timelineItems.name: Laura
timelineItems.text: Ok where's all the haters at? Hugs to @jacob__peterson #MLS #skc 1-0

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: The Crew can't even make it out of their half of the field. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Higuaín having to dip WAY back to find the ball -- deeper than the midfield evenYet #Crew96 still can't seem to find a way out.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Great defense there from Sinovic. Blocked the cross attempt and stays with the man to push it out for a throw. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Zusi with the power knee there...Cauldron loud as usual. Let's go #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Brady
timelineItems.text: Already Winning #sportingkc

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Columbus Crew 0.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: That's it. #SportingKC take the 2-0 comprehensive victory. Back on top in the East.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: The Columbus Crew have not scored from the run of play in more than 180 minutes. Last one came from Jimenez. #crew96

timelineItems.name: Tod Palmer
timelineItems.text: Nice win for #SportingKC, which is tied for first in the MLS East. Good to see @TacaBielerSKC find the back of the net again.

timelineItems.name: Nick Norris
timelineItems.text: Another week of hearing about how we should have won and disguising our own problems as their luck #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @SportingKC cruise to a 2-0 win in front of another sellout crowd: http://t.co/9D2d1OA5AC #SKCvCLB http://t.co/NEDIKob9Ly

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: @SportingKC cruise to a 2-0 win in front of another sellout crowd: http://t.co/9D2d1OA5AC #SKCvCLB http://t.co/NEDIKob9Ly

timelineItems.desc: 2013 MLS Cup Champions host the Columbus Crew at Sporting Park in a battle atop the Eastern Conference.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Sporting Kansas City vs. Columbus Crew | May 4, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two goals --> top of the East. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/I5WmZ83Yna #SKCvCLB http://t.co/stgZHjBL36

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two goals --> top of the East. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/I5WmZ83Yna #SKCvCLB http://t.co/stgZHjBL36

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Kaitlyn McGoldrick
timelineItems.text: Please stop passing to the guys in blue!!!! #Crew96

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Peterson is looking confident on the ball after that goal. Shot is blocked this time and then Zusi puts it out for a goal kick. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City).
Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 passing percentage hovering around 79%, which is surprisingly higher than I would have thought. It's looked far worse.

timelineItems.name: Garrett Harmon
timelineItems.text: Seems to be more space occupying than man-marking...as a keeper that makes me nervous #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Tony Tchani tries a through ball, but Héctor Jiménez is caught offside.
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Greg Benson
timelineItems.text: Does it really matter who's missing on defense for @SportingKC if we're never in the attacking half? #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Astroheader
timelineItems.text: If you imagine #Crew96 all just met each other 30 minutes ago, they look pretty decent.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Josh Williams.

timelineItems.name: Cody Brinckman
timelineItems.text: Robb is easily the best owner in the league. He let me wear his championship ring.

timelineItems.comment: Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Matt Herchik
timelineItems.text: Have we even had a shot yet? #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Cody Sharrett
timelineItems.text: High pressure vs. High pressure - This will be fun to watch. Who will break first? #Crew96 #SKC

timelineItems.name: Neal Sayatovich
timelineItems.text: Really missing @ChadMarshall14 on the #Crew96 defense right now. They have to tighten up and not play from behind. #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wil Trapp with a c
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Eric Kronberg denies Arnor on the line

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Lawrence Olum.
Attempt saved. Bernardo Anor (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wil Trapp with a cross.
Attempt missed. Héctor Jiménez (Columbus Crew) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: Last week, #RBNY put pressure on #Crew96 for about 10 minutes. #SCK have done it all game thus far.

timelineItems.name: Jody Strauch
timelineItems.text: KRONKED!! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Matt Herchik
timelineItems.text: Okay, how did he save that? #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew. Waylon Francis tries a through ball, but Federico Higuaín is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Steve Clark sticks out a foot to deny Sinovic

timelineItems.name: Scott Wesseler
timelineItems.text: One hell of a service by Trapp, one hell of a save by SKC. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: THAT is why Bernardo Anor should always be in the box for set pieces. Yes, he's good on the ball. But no other #Crew96 player can do that.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Oriol Rosell with a through ball.
Foul by Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew).
Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Graham Zusi tries a through ball, but Paulo Nagamura is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Matt Russell
timelineItems.text: Seth "Playoffs" Sinovic still only scores in the postseason. #SportingKC #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: SAVE! Kronberg stops a snap header from close range ON THE LINE: http://t.co/9v4NrgM3B8 #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: I'm a huge Jimenez fan, but he nearly cost #Crew96 a goal there. Bailed out by Steve Clark. *shocker*

timelineItems.desc: Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Lawrence Olum pushes Higuain from behind

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Jacob Peterson tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Lake County Legion
timelineItems.text: Errors, errors, errors! #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Theo Gauthier
timelineItems.text: Then you switch to the #SKC match, and you see what it looks like when a team attracts a great crowd. #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Paulo Nagamura’s first time shot is high

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 doing a better job of handling the early #SKC pressure than they did with #NYRB last week.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Seth Sinovic tries a through ball, but Dominic Dwyer is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Olum sees yellow for a needless hack at Higuain. Unsurprisingly, #SportingKC outnumbering #Crew96 in fouls 8-2.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.name: Brett Zalaski
timelineItems.text: We're SURE we don't want Trapp in Brazil...right @J_Klinsmann? #WhatATackle #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Dave Edinger
timelineItems.text: Huge defense by Trapp last few minutes. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Morgan Hughes
timelineItems.text: It took Zusi fourteen minutes to take that corner kick. This is beyond boring. #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Wil Trapp clatters Nagamura

timelineItems.name: Daniel Karell
timelineItems.text: The Crew have lacked a passing rhythm all day long. Credit to Sporting KC for upping the tempo. #skc #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Scott Wesseler
timelineItems.text: The Black and Gold are looking too heavy footed and disorganized so far, not up to par with SKC. Something has gotta change. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew).
Delay in match Paulo Nagamura (Sporting Kansas City) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: SportingKC WUFC
timelineItems.text: I was thinking... I have faith in very little in life. I have 100% faith in Eric Kronberg as our keeper. That's a pleasant feeling. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: JR
timelineItems.text: Would like to see Paladini come on at the half. For Jimenez? #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 1, Columbus Crew 0.

timelineItems.text: Paulo down briefly but back up. 1 min stoppage to go in this half. #SKC #crew96 http://t.co/eFnE39OVZU

timelineItems.text: Paulo down briefly but back up. 1 min stoppage to go in this half. #SKC #crew96 http://t.co/eFnE39OVZU

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC needs to continue to apply the pressure in the second half. Can't sit back and defend against Columbus. Just won't work.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Sporting Kansas City 1, Columbus Crew 0.

timelineItems.name: Shayna Half
timelineItems.text: Dom coming in to start the second half!! Let's make something happen in the attacking half, we need this win! #Crew96 #ColumbusTilIDie

timelineItems.text: Steve Clark never does seem to be in much of a hurry to get rid of the ball, does he? #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Dustin Struble
timelineItems.text: Not bad seats. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Graham Zusi.

timelineItems.name: Jared Contraguerro
timelineItems.text: That was TOO CLOSE #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Anor really doesn't look sharp today. He had that nice header, but that's been all. #Crew96 may need Meram out there.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew. Conceded by Oriol Rosell.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Worst moment of Michael Parkhurst's time with #Crew96 just then. He needed to get a touch on that cross. Lucky that Dwyer couldn't finish.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: Two quick corners for #Crew96 as they put pressure on early in the second half.

timelineItems.text: Teaching my nephew about the great game of soccer. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Paul Fisto
timelineItems.text: Anor beginning to click one week off put him off his game. #Crew96

timelineItems.text: Opposing attacks have been quoting Admiral Ackbar all season long. #MayThe4thBeWithYou #Crew96

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7 - SKC have scored in the first half in 7 consecutive #MLS games against Columbus. Trend. #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC is 22-21-6 all time against Columbus and 12-9-2 at home in the series. SKC has not lost at home this season (2-0-2). #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: Last-minute target practice. #Crew96 http://t.co/382HU2yQZv

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Perfect timing on that Besler sliding tackle for the block in the box. Just so good. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: #Crew96 being out-possessed today. If that holds up, it would be the first time all season they haven't had more of the ball.

timelineItems.name: JP Lococo
timelineItems.text: Battle for top of the @MLS table in the East is about to begin on @NBCSports. If you're a soccer fan, do yourself a favor a tune in.#Crew96

timelineItems.name: rosieshriver
timelineItems.text: It's a good day for a Sporting KC game. #skc

timelineItems.name: Marcus Stephenson
timelineItems.text: Indians lose. #Crew96, you are Ohio's "only hope" on Star Wars Day. #MayThe4thBeWithYou

timelineItems.name: Steven Rodriguez
timelineItems.text: #MLSCUP CHAMPS! I held @aureliencollin78's ring... is this real life?  #SportingKc

timelineItems.text: Despite going head to head with the #Royals today, it feels like Sporting Park is over capacity for today's match. #SportingKC

timelineItems.text: More or less the same starting XI that Gregg Berhalter has selected for #Crew96 in the last few matches out. Big test for the usual suspects

Here we go! Go Sporting!!!!

timelineItems.text: Let's start this campaign! @JozyAltidore #JozyToColumbus #Crew96

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Sunday afternoon match between Sporting KC and the Columbus Crew. Will Benny Feilhaber have space to operate against the Crew midfield? How will Columbus attack with Aurelien Collin missing the match? Find out Sunday at 4pm ET on NBCSN.

timelineItems.text: Oh it's our DP. Taca will be with you shortly! :-) #SKC http://t.co/glPaJcSMk5

timelineItems.text: Oh it's our DP. Taca will be with you shortly! :-) #SKC http://t.co/glPaJcSMk5

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.desc: Second yellow card to Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew) for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: RED CARD: Will Trapp picks up a second yellow for taking down Feilhaber

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: 41 straight MLS sellouts @SportingPark. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 6’: Pipa takes a hard challenge from Nagamura. No booking, but there was some bite to that tackle. Higuain is fine to continue for #Crew96.

timelineItems.name: Reid Shoop
timelineItems.text: Maybe give someone a shot in Tchani's position? Maybe just for a bit. Just to see what it's like? #crew96

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Wil Trapp (Columbus Crew).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: SAVE: Monster stop on the line prevents a @ColumbusCrew equalizer. WATCH: http://t.co/h0XzAe1VPE #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dom Dwyer’s rocket is pushed over by Clark

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Oriol Rosell (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Jody Strauch
timelineItems.text: Hoping the man advantage might wake up #SKC.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Smith
timelineItems.text: Pretty much saw that coming. Trapp was leaking the ball all day, making poor challenges as a result. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Steve Clark.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Wil Trapp just sent off for a second yellow; no arguments about it either. A much bigger hole for #Crew96 to dig out of now.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Dominic Oduro (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Michael Saad
timelineItems.text: Boatloads of possession. Dearth of ideas in the attacking third. Need more creativity from Josh Williams down the right wing. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Giancarlo Gonzalez (Columbus Crew) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Federico Higuaín with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Morgan Hughes
timelineItems.text: There has been maybe 90 seconds of actual play in the last ten minutes. This is miserably boring. #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew).
Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Tony Tchani pushes Dwyer as he walks off

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Benny Feilhaber has just not been pleased with the referee's decisions tonight. #sportingkc #crew96

timelineItems.name: Pat Guldenpfennig
timelineItems.text: Craziness! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Matt Russell
timelineItems.text: Anyone else hear that funky DisCo beat? #SportingKC #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: RED CARD! @wil_trapp shown his second yellow + #crew96 are reduced to 10: http://t.co/QPUiuHnLm6 #SKCvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Alex Martinez (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Seth Sinovic.

timelineItems.name: Evonne Segall
timelineItems.text: I guess it's Oprah night at #SKC park: "You get a card, and YOU get a card, and *YOU* get a card!!" #crew96

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Poor decision-making from both Francis and Higuain. Turnovers in the middle of the park can be #Crew96's undoing. They've gotta cut that out

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 1, Columbus Crew 0. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Jacob Peterson pounces on the loose ball

timelineItems.name: Jason Connelly
timelineItems.text: Not exactly impressed with the decision making from #Crew96 today. Making an already tough week even tougher.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Besler down, looks like a cramp from here. Should be fine. 90th minute now. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match  (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Mari
timelineItems.text: Nobody pushes @Ddwyer14 down! #notcool #skc #meanfaces http://t.co/5OMqEV6Ivz

timelineItems.name: Columbus Crew
timelineItems.text: 90'+: Williams' long throw is batted around inside the box before Kronberg snags it. #Crew96

timelineItems.name: Mari
timelineItems.text: Nobody pushes @Ddwyer14 down! #notcool #skc #meanfaces http://t.co/5OMqEV6Ivz

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City).
Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Chance Myers (Sporting Kansas City).
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Martinez needed to hit that. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: This #SKC - #crew96 game reminds me of the worst of the games between Fitzgerald and Newman-coached teams. Not dirty, but ugly.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Sporting Kansas City 2, Columbus Crew 0. Claudio Bieler (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Claudio Bieler finishes as SKC capitalize on Parkhurst’s mistake

timelineItems.name: ThisIsSporting.com
timelineItems.text: Soony did all the work, the Zusi with the chip to Bieler for the tap-in. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Paula Ramsay
timelineItems.text: What happened to the @ColumbusCrew who were playing in March?? What a mess on this field today! #Crew96

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Sporting Kansas City 2, Columbus Crew 0.
